metadata.title: CVE-2024-0093 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU software for Linux contains a vulnerability where it can exposesensitive information to an actor that is not explicitly authorized to haveaccess to that information. A successful exploit of this vulnerabilitymight lead to information disclosure.

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').
linux-hwe-6.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.5').
